page.title: 19*House renovation***********
page.content:
We bought our next door neighbours house when she died aged about 93. It used to be the old Quaker meeting place. It had to have a lot done to it. First we got rid of the old oil tank. The house had two doors, one at the front and one at the side. We blocked both doors. We had problems fillling in the front door because it had a porch and the front of the house had a pattern so we built the front so the pattern continued.
We had to put new windows in, four downstairs, two upstairs, two on the side, and one patio door at the back. We have sevenrooms, four upstairs and three down and a hall. Our old house has three rooms upstairs. We knocked through to the other house to make it into one house.
